Package org.restlet.connector

Mechanisms that enable communication between components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Cache Connector used to reduce interaction latency.
Client Connector that initiates communication by making a request.
Connector Abstract mechanism that enables communication between components.
Resolver Connector that translates resource identifiers into network address information.
Server Connector that listens for connections and responds to requests.
Tunnel Connector that simply relays communication across a connection boundary.
 

Class Summary
AbstractConnector Abstract connector implementation.
LocalClient Local client connector.
LocalConnector Local connector implementation.
 

Package org.restlet.connector Description

Mechanisms that enable communication between components.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
